title-group.article-title: COMPUTING ùíë-ADIC L-FUNCTIONS OF TOTALLY REAL NUMBER FIELDS

abstract.p: We prove new explicit formulas for the p-adic L-functions of totally real number fields and show how these formulas can be used to compute values and representations of p-adic L-functions.
